text: Colin Arthur Garwood (born 29 June 1949 in Heacham, Norfolk) is an English former professional footballer who scored 157 goals from 426 games in the Football League playing as a striker for Peterborough United, Oldham Athletic, Huddersfield Town, Colchester United, Portsmouth and Aldershot during the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s. The £54,000 Aldershot paid Portsmouth in February 1980 was a club record. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Heacham Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Peterborough United F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Colchester United F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Aldershot F.C. players Category:Boston United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Colin Garwood
